DOC.brief_title: A Safety Tolerability Study ABT-126 Elderly
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 65 year great . Has MMSE score 27 high . History dementia include limited Alzheimer 's disease , Parkinson 's disease multinfarct dementia . History significant neurological disease . Has estimate creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min
